name: HealthCare
description:
Small little Game Jam Game for the 

Mini Jam 128: Health

with the 

Limitation: The only way to go is up

Controls: WASD to Move

Goal: Survive for 5 Minutes to win the game

You Level Up by picking up Monster Essence and on every Level Up you can buy Upgrades and new Weapons. But be careful because buying stuff costs you your Health. Also be careful of the horde coming from south, they hurt a lot!
